title: Language Practical Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Online/Hybrid PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and foundational job-related expertise
context.additional_context: A customized language education program for current practitioners, focusing on improving problem-solving skills in real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically resolve language-related problems that may occur in real work situations through a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach
Learners can communicate effectively and manage projects in hybrid environments using online collaboration tools
Learners can develop and present job-integrated outcomes based on language expertise acquired through the PBL process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
